title: How Do I Start Building Wealth? (Hour 2)
description:
Take our Audience Survey & Enter to Win a $500 Visa Gift Card: Click here to take the survey

Dave Ramsey & Rachel Cruze discuss:

How to build wealth,

Refinancing a house,

Being debt-free but still stressed out about money.
